title: The Cutting Edge
description: From New York Times bestselling author Linda Howard comes a fan-favorite tale of romantic intrigueBrett Rutland is the top troubleshooter at Carter Engineering, and he's used to getting his way. When he's tasked with cracking an internal embezzlement case, he meets firm accountant Tessa Conway. She's beautiful and interested, but falling for her will not only test Brett's control, it may also jeopardize the caseâ€”especially since she's the prime suspect.
author: Linda Howard
